headline: Fidelity National Information Services (NYSE:FIS) Partners With Visa To Enhance Payments Capabilities
summary: Fidelity National Information Services (NYSE:FIS) recently expanded its partnership with Visa, providing smaller banks with advanced payment capabilities, a move aligned with their strategy to innovate and grow within financial services. This partnership, along with their collaboration with ATLAS SP Partners and launch of new products like the Money Movement Hub, added weight to FIS's share price, which rose 7.5% last quarter. This performance notably outpaced the general market's 1.7%...

headline: FIS and Visa Deepen Their Relationship to Provide Regional and Community Banks With Easier Access to Powerful Payments Capabilities
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., June 26, 2025--FIS® (NYSE: FIS), a global leader in financial technology, today announced the expansion of its partnership with Visa, a world leader in digital payments, to arm financial institutions of all sizes with turnkey access to new payments capabilities. Regional and community banks that join FIS’ technology ecosystem will gain access to new payments products and services that can help grow revenues, retain customers and reduce fraud losses.
